archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Collect Party Demographic
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Collect a demographic about a party and/or one or more roles a party plays.

properties.value: Collect Party Demographic collects a demographic about a party and/or one or more roles a party plays. The demographic is placed in a group according to the definition of the demographic. Its relationship to a geographic area, product offering, or market segment may also be established. It can be collected directly from a party or from another source, such as social media, professional groups to which a party belongs, and census data. This process also enables changes to be made to any of these aspects for a demographic.
